content.rendered:
Preface

Another year has come to the end, and here we are to sum up what was accomplished by Atomic wallet team in 2019 and share the plans for 2020. 

This year, we’ve made the wallet more convenient and friendly by constantly improving it and filling up with cool features. So now it’s time to break new ground and make Atomic even better!

What is done in 2019

Android and iOS apps released

At the beginning of 2019, the wallet had been launched on Android and then on iOS in the mid Fall. Since that time, Atomic has supported all major desktop and mobile versions. They are all synchronized with each other. Overall, we have more than 200,000 downloads.

Over 200K downloads all over the world

More than 200,000 people worldwide have become Atomic wallet users this year. As a company focused on developing a simple and accessible product for anyone, we are very flattered to see these numbers!

Company has grown to 25 employees and became profitable

In less than 6 months after launching Atomic wallet, the company has become profitable. More than 10 skilled employees came on board this year, and our team onsite is 25 people by now. 10 to 15 people, our chat admins, copywriters, HTML/CSS developers are working remotely.

20 new assets added

More and more of your favorite assets are being supported in Atomic. Cosmos, Nano, Algorand, Ontology Gas, Nem, Zilliqa, Komodo, Raven, Ark, Aeternity, and others. You can easily send, receive, exchange, stake and hold crypto in one wallet!

20 release updates published

We’ve released our application for desktop and mobile 20 times. All the versions are synchronized with each other and have a similar set of features: buying and exchanging crypto with built-in services, fingerprint scanner, face ID, wallet connect (for mobile apps), instant updates for major assets on desktop, local currency (to track portfolio in BTC, USD, EUR, GBP, & more than 30 other popular currencies), and custom commissions to set custom fees for BTC, ETH, & most assets in Atomic.

It’s a priority to Atomic to stay up-to-date with the latest developments in blockchains.

Staking for major assets

Atomic has begun adding staking support for PoS assets since November. The main quality of staking in Atomic that it is non-custodial. Users choose validators by themselves and get rewards directly not being charged for anything by the wallet. 

Stake ATOM, XTZ, TRX, ONT, NEO, ALGO, KMD, VET, BTT, WINk in the wallet and support the decentralization network!

AWC token is listed on Binance DEX

Atomic Wallet Token (AWC) has got listed on Binance DEX, a decentralized exchange, when 50.000.000 AWC or 50% of token supply were issued on the Binance Chain – BEP2 token standard. 

This guide will help you to trade AWC on Binance DEX and fully control your funds during the process. Enjoy a secure, fast and smooth trading experience!

Membership rewards program launched

If you use instant exchange in Atomic Wallet, you can get Cash back – up to 1% every month! We have released our Membership program in July and by the end of the year, over 500 users joined the Membership and shared more than 200,000 AWC rewards! 

We’ve just updated the design of the program. You will get 10 AWC rewards for the first exchange. Find out more about the Membership and join the program!

What we will do in the next year

  • Portfolio discovery and price charts
  • Localization for most popular languages
  • 10-20 new assets with own blockchains
  • Staking support for 5-10 new assets
  • Lightning payments implementation
  • Hardware wallets integration (Trezor, Ledger)
  • New fiat gateways (buy crypto with better rates)
  • New instant exchange partners
  • Most popular DeFi services integration
  • Borrow and crypto lending services
  • Affiliate program launch based on AWC token
  • Instant assets updates for mobile 
  • Push notifications and price alerts on mobile
  • Trading desk for major exchanges
  • Wallet design update

More future developments are coming! We are looking forward to this new year with anticipation and excitement to go down the road with you and make Atomic wallet even better and more convenient together. Stay tuned!
